about_the_game: A semi sci-fi online PVP FPS shooter game with multiple maps, various weapon categories to master, incredibly fast paced movement with cool futuristic jetpack and jumppads around the map. Pickup armors and take control over enemy spawn to completely annihilate them
detailed_description: A semi sci-fi online PVP FPS shooter game with multiple maps, various weapon categories to master, incredibly fast paced movement with cool futuristic jetpack and jumppads around the map. Pickup armors and take control over enemy spawn to completely annihilate them

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux with HW acceleration
  • Processor: Intel i3-3100 or AMD Ryzen 1200X
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTS 450 or AMD Radeon HD 5750
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: GPU must support Vulkan + Compute Shader
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux with HW acceleration
  • Processor: Intel i3-3100 or AMD Ryzen 1200X
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7950
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: GPU must support Vulkan + Compute Shader

name: Parabellum Beta

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11, 64-bit versions only.
  • Processor: Intel i3-3100 or AMD Ryzen 1200X
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTS 450 or AMD Radeon HD 5750
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: GPU must support DX11 + Pixel Shader Model 5.0
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 and Windows 11, 64-bit versions only
  • Processor: Intel i5-3300 or AMD Ryzen 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050Ti or AMD Radeon RX 470
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: GPU must support DX11/DX12 + Pixel Shader Model 5.0

short_description: A semi sci-fi online PVP FPS shooter game with multiple maps, various weapon categories to master, incredibly fast paced movement with cool futuristic jetpack and jumppads around the map. Pickup armors and take control over enemy spawn to completely annihilate them
